<DOMAIN>BUSINESS-DEVELOPMENT</DOMAIN>
<RESUME_START>
STAFFING BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER

SUMMARY

Results-oriented Business development professional with a 10-year track record of surpassing sales quotas within highly competitive markets across a broad range of industries.
Exceptional communicator with a consultative sales style, success in leading effective strategies to improve problem-solving abilities, and a keen client needs assessment aptitude.
Aggressively identify opportunities, develop focus, and provide tactical business solutions.
To be a part of a growing organization utilizing my business development sales experience, management, and problem-solving skills to increase profits and bolster growth.

EXPERIENCE

Staffing Business Development Manager

to

Actively identify and generate leads through strategic sales and marketing plan.
Heavy outbound cold calls targeting employers that are hiring to market internal top talent.
Research decision makers in each department to introduce services and setup meeting to present solutions.
Analyze available staffing resources for most efficient placement based on enterprise needs, peer-unit needs, and unit needs.
Devise and execute strategic recruitment plans aligning with company's recruitment strategy.
Maintain ongoing follow-up with prospective clients both in person and by phone.
Continuously evaluate businesses to determine which staffing scenario would be suitable for clients overall staffing objective.
Promote team effectiveness through orientation, on-going training, and performance feedback.

Established innovative ideas on how to increase enrollments by building stronger rapport and executing a consultative sales strategies.
Held educational seminars, webinars and networking events to educate prospective students and professionals on the behavioral programs we offered.
Developed academic plans for degree or certificate completion in accordance with the university's guidelines.
Recruited qualified applicants for admissions to the University in accordance with the state and federal accreditation.
Maintained sales progress, conversion and related reports on a weekly basis.
Analyzed market trends and developed strategies to grow business relationships within territory.
Designed, planned and negotiated terms on partnership agreements as well as researched competitor events to identify their strengths and weaknesses in order to become more knowledgeable and be able to handle overcome objections.

Coached, developed and promoted team members based on productivity.
Drove operational efficiency to help minimize risk and protect the stores assets by managing inventory count.
Monitored daily sales activities and contract negotiations to ensure goals are being met with accordance of the leadership expectations.
Exceeded sales goals every month during an economic downturn.
Reviewed financials, contracts and sales records to ensure proper compliance.
Handled all escalated customer issues, evaluated client satisfaction results by creating strategies to maintain business relationships and finding effective ways to lower down churn and increase subscribers.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Business Developer

Location: Philadelphia, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Business Developer
REMOTE POSITION: MUST BE ELIGIBLE TO WORK IN THE USEvent and training company supporting Life Science industries is in search of a trade experienced business development professional.
 RESPONSIBILITIES:Business Development:* Develop new sales opportunities by executing sales strategies targeting new accounts fitting the Company Model.* Establish rapport to take a consultative approach to solving client problems. Earn prospect trust to learn their needs and provide a Company solution roadmap.* Present and demonstrate the value of Company solutions to qualified prospective clients; always positioning to close business.* Produce optimal proposal materials to clearly define the company’s value proposition as an impetus to contract new business.* Implement Business Plans to increase sales volume, and market share, expand relationships, and create referral opportunities.* Always contribute market insight for improved and expanded Company offerings.Execution and Revenue Generation:* Seek out, build, and maintain a targeted prospect list to pursue.* Meet and exceed Company sales objectives by adopting the Company methodology, including KPI adherence, exceeding activity targets.* Employ CRM for prospect development, activities tracking, forecasting, reporting, and accountability.* Prepare and negotiate agreements to optimize selling Gross Margins in consultation with the team.Post-Sale Responsibilities:* Work with Processing, Finance, Education & Training teams to transition new clients to the company process.* Collaborate with internal staff to resolve any issues related to implementation or support,* Leverage key accounts or partner relationships for additional sales and referrals.* Perform impactful Quarterly Business Reviews (QBR) with key clients to ensure satisfaction and uncover additional opportunities.* Provide feedback to Senior Management regarding ways to decrease the sales cycle, enhance sales, and/or improve the Company’s brand and reputation.* Provide ongoing market perspective by monitoring competitors, attending conferences (e.g., LTEN), and participating in campaigns.* Represent Company professionally and effectively and function as an ambassador for the brand at all times including conferences, professional organizations, and networking events as well as all internal interactions.REQUIREMENTS:* Bachelor’s degree in Sales, Communication or Business or related field* 3-5 years’ proven successful sales experience in Life Sciences industry.* Comprehensive and current knowledge of industry offerings and trends* Outstanding knowledge of MS Office; knowledge of CRM software* Soft skills: Motivated, skilled influencer and negotiator; excellent interpersonal skills, strong communication skills, ability to effectively lead and interact with multiple disciplines/departments; solid relationship-building skills; superior customer service skills.

Experience Level (if available): Director
<JD_END>
